parameters.description: Fetch AccountBalance by type/address.
parameters.name: AccountAddress

parameters.description: Fetch AccountBalance by its balance (account balance <  BalanceLowerThan).
parameters.name: BalanceLowerThan

parameters.description: Fetch AccountBalance by its balance (account balance >  BalanceHigherThan).
parameters.name: BalanceHigherThan

parameters.description: Fetch AccountBalance by its spendablebalance (account spendablebalance <  BalanceLowerThan).
parameters.name: SpendableBalanceLowerThan

parameters.description: Fetch AccountBalance by its spendablebalance (account spendablebalance >  BalanceHigherThan).
parameters.name: SpendableBalanceHigherThan

parameters.description: Fetch AccountBalance by its spendablebalance (account spendablebalance <  BalanceLowerThan).
parameters.name: PopRevenueBalanceLowerThan

parameters.description: Fetch AccountBalance by its popRevenuebalance (account popRevenuebalance >  BalanceHigherThan).
parameters.name: PopRevenueBalanceHigherThan

parameters.description: Fetch AccountBalance by its Block height.
parameters.name: BlockHeight

parameters.description: Number indicating chaintype.
parameters.name: ChainType

parameters.description: Block ID.
parameters.name: ID

parameters.description: number of block to fetch.
parameters.name: Height

parameters.description: Number indicating chaintype.
parameters.name: ChainType

parameters.description: Number of block to fetch.
parameters.name: Limit

parameters.description: Fetch block from `n` height.
parameters.name: Height

parameters.description: Fetch Mempool Transaction by its TransactionBytes.
parameters.name: ID

parameters.description: Fetch Mempool transactions from arrival timestamp start from n.
parameters.name: timestampStart

parameters.description: Fetch Mempool transactions to arrival timestamp end until n.
parameters.name: timestampEnd

parameters.description: SenderAddress and RecipientAddress.
parameters.name: address

parameters.description:
Fetch Node Registries based on queue status 
2 : will retrieve node registries that have been deleted
1 : will retrieve node registries that still pending
0: will retrieve node registries that already registered.
parameters.name: RegistrationStatus

parameters.description: Fetch Node Registries when registration height is greater than or equal to.
parameters.name: MinRegistrationHeight

parameters.description: Fetch Node Registries when registration height is less than or equal to.
parameters.name: MaxRegistrationHeight

parameters.description: Fetch Transaction by its ID.
parameters.name: ID

modelAccountBalance.title: AccountBalance represent the transaction data structure stored in the database

modelBlock.title: Block represent the block data structure stored in the database

modelBlockExtendedInfo.title: BlockExtendedInfo represent the Block data plus part of block data not to be persisted to database

modelEmpty.title: Empty structure to represent empty parameter in proto

Total.title: Number of node registry in total

modelGetTransactionMinimumFeeResponse.title: GetTransactionMinimumFeeResponse a model response for GetTransactionMinimumFeeRequest, indicates the minimum fee for provided tx

modelHost.title: Host represent data sructure node and listed peers in node it's self

Available.title: RAM available for programs to allocate

Free.description:
This is the kernel's notion of free memory; RAM chips whose bits nobody
cares about the value of right now. For a human consumable number,
Available is what you really want.

modelMempoolTransaction.title: Mempool represent the mempool data structure stored in the database

MultiSignatureInfo.title: MultiSignatureInfo represent the information of the multisig-address

SignatureInfo.title: List of participantAddress-participantSignature with its tx hash

UnsignedTransactionBytes.title: Unsigned transaction bytes that will be executed once the transaction is valid

modelNode.title: NodeInfo represent the node information data structure

NodeAddress.title: Funds to be locked to register the node

BlacklistingTime.title: BlacklistingTime is timestamp when a peer start in list of blacklist peers

ResolvingTime.title: ResolvingTime is timestamp when a peer start in list of resolved peers

UnresolvingTime.title: UnresolvingTime is timestamp when a peer start in list of unresolved peers

RecipientAccountAddress.title: Account Address that got property of Dataset

modelSendBlockTransactionsResponse.title: SendBlockTransactionsResponse a model response of a process sending block's transactions

modelSendTransactionResponse.title: SendTransactionResponse a model response of send a transaction in p2pCommunication service

MuchTime.title: How long Dataset will active in second

RecipientAccountAddress.title: Account Address that got property of Dataset

modelSignatureInfo.title: represent the signature posted by account

modelSpineBlockManifest.title: SpineBlockManifest represent the spineBlockManifest data structure stored in the database

ChainType.title: Number indicating chaintype (at the moment it can only be mainchain, but in future could be others)

ExpirationTimestamp.title: ExpirationTimestamp timestamp that marks the end of spineBlockManifest processing

FileChunkHashes.title: FileChunkHashes sequence of hashes (sha256 = 32 byte) of file chunks (sorted) referenced by the spineBlockManifest

FullFileHash.title: FullFileHash hash of the full - completed (snapshot) file

ID.title: ID computed as the little endian of the spineBlockManifest hash (hash of all spineBlockManifest fields but the ID)

SpineBlockManifestHeight.title:
SpineBlockManifestHeight height (on the mainchain) at which the (snapshot) file started been computed
Note: this is not the last mainchain height contained in the snapshot file (that one should be = SpineBlockManifestHeight - MinRollbackBlocks)

modelSpineBlockManifestType.title: SpineBlockManifestType type of spineBlockManifest (as of now only snapshot)

modelSpinePublicKey.title: Block represent the block data structure stored in the database

modelSpinePublicKeyAction.title: RequestType used to sign a node administration request

modelTransaction.title: Transaction represent the transaction data structure stored in the database

LockedBalance.title: Funds to be locked to register the node
